text: A Maiko is a beginner Geisha. They are usually around 15 to 20 years old. The training to become a Maiko is usually around 10 months long. Maiko, the apprentice geisha, dedicate themselves to honing their cultural and entertainment skills. Their attire is deliberately striking, designed to draw attention away from their still-developing expertise. Maiko reside in the "mother's" house and rely on a modest stipend provided by the geisha establishment. == Related pages == *Geisha == References == Category:Entertainment in Japan Category:Japanese people by occupation
title: Maiko
